attributes.action: Do not close Ty Newydd Care Home (Heol Trelai, Ely)
attributes.additional_details: I am an unhappy bunny; my nan has settled down in this care home as she's got dementia and they are closing it down. Making many people lose work and others finding it a struggle to be re homed. Many residents have stayed here and consider it their home - with everyone's signature it can help to stop this!
